Instruction: If using fresh green beans, trim the ends and blanch them in boiling water for 3-5 minutes, or until crisp-tender. Drain and rinse with cold water. Frozen green beans can be used according to package instructions, thawed and drained.
In a large bowl, combine the green beans, condensed cream of mushroom soup, milk, half of the French's fried onions, salt, and black pepper.
Stir in the optional soy sauce for a deeper savory flavor (optional).
Pour the mixture into a greased 1.5-quart casserole dish.
Sprinkle the remaining half of the French's fried onions on top of the casserole.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the casserole is bubbly and the onions are golden brown.
